thread.section_title: RushMyPassport.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RushMyPassport.com | rushmypassport.com | 3 of 151
thread.title: Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text: I was discouraged to find out 44 hrs. before my trip that my expedited passport was being held up by the US Dept. I called to voice my displeasure & the rush my passport team guiding me through a mad dash of additional documents. They had a courier take my additional documentation to the proper place, that same evening I received confirmation that my passport would be there in time. I received the passport in the morning & am currently on my trip.
